contexts.context: ...each of the contracting parties a limited power of <mark>search</mark> and capture of Ships engaged in this horrible traffic...
..., excepting in cases of extraordinary suspicion, to <mark>search</mark> the vessels which sail under Its protection.
...of comment, as it admits the possibility of <mark>search</mark> on the other side of the Atlantick and in...
...own Account, that no Officer would hesitate to <mark>search</mark> the Vessel in order to detect the Fraud....
